title: Apple Store down ahead of iPhone SE 3, green iPhone 13, and new iPad Air 5 pre-orders [U]
content:
Update: Apple Store is back. Users can now pre-order iPhone SE 3, green iPhone 13, and M1 iPad Air 5.

After its first event of the year on Tuesday, Apple will start selling its first batch of products later this morning. Until then, the Apple Online Store is down for anyone that tries to make a purchase.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple Store down ahead of iPhone SE 3, green iPhone 13, and new iPad Air 5 pre-orders [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple will start selling its first batch of products later this morning. Until then, its Online Store is down for anyone that tries to make a purchase.
